title: Plants vs. Zombies Volume 1: Lawnmageddon
description: The confusing-yet-brilliant inventor known only as Crazy Dave helps his niece, Patrice, and young adventurer Nate Timely fend off a "fun-dead" neighborhood invasion in Plants vs. Lawnmageddon ! Winner of over thirty "Game of the Year" awards, Plants vs. Zombies is now determined to shuffle onto all-ages bookshelves to tickle funny bones and thrill... brains .* The first Plants vs. Zombies comic book!*
author: Paul Tobin
